Name: 45165 - Oregon, OH
Abstract: GLOS in-situ buoy in Lake Erie. Owned and maintained by LimnoTech. This buoy is sponsored by the City of Toledo Department of Public Utilities, Division of Water Treatment to monitor conditions near the water intake for the Collins Park Water Treatment Plant's intake crib located 3 miles offshore of Oregon, OH.
